remarks: Two ways of expressing "an atom is not less than or equal to a lattice element."  ( ~ atnssm0 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2012.)
statement:
atnle.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
atnle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
atnle.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
atnle.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
atnle.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atnle $p |- ( ( K e. AtLat /\ P e. A /\ X e. B ) -> ( -. P .<_ X <-> ( P ./\ X ) = .0. ) ) $.
